00023 /**
00024  * Init the module
00025  */
00026 void signals_init(void) {
00027 
00028         DEBUG_MSG("DEBUG: signals_init: BEGIN\n");
00029 
00030         // Confine all process signals
00031         //  to one thread: easier management
00032 
00033         /* block all signals */
00034         sigset_t        signal_set;
00035 
00036         sigfillset( &signal_set );
00037         pthread_sigmask( SIG_BLOCK, &signal_set, NULL );
00038 
00039         /* create the signal handling thread */
00040         pthread_create( &__signal_thread, NULL, __signals_handler_thread, NULL );
00041 
00042         DEBUG_MSG("DEBUG: signals_init: END\n");
00043 
00044 }// signal_init

00073 /**
00074  * Signal Handler for the whole process
00075  */
00076 void *__signals_handler_thread(void* arg) {
00077 
00078         sigset_t signal_set;
00079         int sig;
00080 
00081         for(;;) {
00082                         /* wait for any and all signals */
00083                         sigfillset( &signal_set );
00084                         sigwait( &signal_set, &sig );
00085 
00086                         switch( sig ) {
00087 
00088                         case SIGTERM:
00089                           pthread_mutex_lock(&__signals_mutex);
00090                           __caught_signal = SIGTERM;
00091                           pthread_mutex_unlock(&__signals_mutex);
00092                           break;
00093 
00094                         case SIGQUIT:
00095                           pthread_mutex_lock(&__signals_mutex);
00096                           __caught_signal = SIGQUIT;
00097                           pthread_mutex_unlock(&__signals_mutex);
00098                           break;
00099 
00100                          case SIGINT:
00101                           pthread_mutex_lock(&__signals_mutex);
00102                           __caught_signal = SIGINT;
00103                           pthread_mutex_unlock(&__signals_mutex);
00104                           break;
00105 
00106                         default:
00107                           pthread_mutex_lock(&__signals_mutex);
00108                           __caught_signal = 0;
00109                           pthread_mutex_unlock(&__signals_mutex);
00110                           break;
00111                         }
00112         }
00113 
00114         return (void*)0;
00115 }//signal_handler_thread
